title: Scenario-Based Workshop for Enhancing Inclusive Leadership and Innovative Work Behavior in SMEs

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of intermediate-level courses in related fields or equivalent experience
context.additional_context: Strengthens the ability of prospective and in-service teachers to design leadership training programs applicable to real SME (small and medium enterprise) scenarios.

learning_goals: Learners can identify and explain at least five inclusive leadership practices (participatory problem-solving, inclusive communication).
Learners can design scenario-based innovation-inducing strategies tailored to psychological capital (PsyCap) characteristics by employee type.
Learners can propose at least three psychological safety-building techniques applicable in resource-constrained environments.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
